WxWidgets (BCB)

Download

  • Download http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/wxwindows/wxWidgets-2.6.2.zip

Compile

  • With command line, in directory %SOURCE_HOME%/build/msw:
    make -f makefile.bcc -DBUILD=release -DSHARED=0 -DUNICODE=1 -DMSLU=1 -DUSE_GUI=1 -DRUNTIME_LIBS=static -DMONOLITHIC=1

Install

  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/include/wx/ to /Shared/Include/wx/
  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/lib/bcc_lib/mswu/setup.h to /Shared/Include/wx/setup.h
  • Copy %SOURCE_HOME%/lib/bcc_lib/wxmsw26u.lib to /Shared/Library/BCB/WxWidgets.lib
